Featured projects

GeneJam

Laterunner

Clear, concise, communicative, object-oriented code
I'm Kev Adsett, a 27 year old programmer dedicated to producing clean, re-usable, object-oriented code. I am firmly of the belief that code should mostly be readable in English.
